name: A Doktor in Candyland
description:
I am a  Game Developer who has been learning Godot  3.1.1 stable and thought it'd be a great exercise to develop this game in Godot from scratch once again as a learning experience. I've been pretty happy with the engine, and the community too.

THINGS YOU NEED TO KNOW

Gamepad is supported
Arrow Keys supported
Mouse supported(just left click)

Let your creativity and problem solving skills run wild. There's not much text, or instructions other than the obvious. I want playes to give this a try and see if the level design talks by itself, for the most part.

This is my most polished game ever made with Godot. It's a demo, and I have much more than this, I just decided to have this Demo with a few levels for you guys to try it out. I'll make a more fleshed out version of it soon, with more polished everything.

Constructive criticism is welcomed.

Disclaimer:

Fish have no signs of getting hit, but it takes damage. So I know this, and I'll have it juiced up soon.
